name: The Adventures of Mister Cola!
description: Because we all know DoomGuy is actually a superhero in disguise. How else can he run 45 miles per hour without breaking a sweat, carry immense loads, and run straight over gaps that are nearly 10 feet wide? In addition, "Mister Cola" can use his weapons even more effectively after drinking a six-pack of cola. Double the destruction, with no "extra" weapons - just enough to replace all 9 of Doom's defaults.
